ui.options.multiplayer.enableNewChatMenu: The new chat menu uses ImGui. It's customisable, sleek and awesome!
ui.options.multiplayer.enablePosSmoother: Tries to smooth position data from players with unstable connections, reducing vehicle warping/rubber banding
ui.options.multiplayer.enableLowerDamage: (Optimisation) Increase FPS for decreased Damage Model
Reduces Damage Accuracy of non player owned vehicles. Yields more fps. Takes effect on new spawned or edited vehicles
If enabled, your vehicle parts will automatically be synced to other players after a few seconds
ui.options.multiplayer.queueSpawnEdit.to: If enabled, remote vehicle spawns and edits will be put in a queue, instead of applying instantly
ui.options.multiplayer.queueAuto.tooltip: If enabled, you will only spawn queued vehicles once you come to a stop based on the settings below
ui.options.multiplayer.queueApplySpeed.t: Queues apply if your vehicle moves slower than this speed
ui.options.multiplayer.queueApplyTimeout: Queues apply if your vehicle moves under your set speed threshold for this long
ui.options.multiplayer.queueAutoSkipRemo: If enabled and spectating other players, you will spawn queued vehicles right away
ui.options.multiplayer.queueSkipUnicycle: If enabled, you will spawn other Unicycles (Snowmen/Beamlings) right away
If enabled, other vehicles will run limited Lua calculations, improving performance
ui.options.multiplayer.debugOutput: Show network activity in the console
ui.options.multiplayer.launcherPort: Launcher port:[br]Don't change unless you have to
ui.options.multiplayer.launcherPortWarn: Don't change unless you have to
ui.options.multiplayer.launcherPort.tool: Set this to the custom port that the launcher was set to use.
ui.options.multiplayer.clearLauncherCach: Enabling this will clear the currently download mod cache of the launcher. Doing this will result in you having to download all mods for each server you join again.
ui.options.multiplayer.skipOtherPlayersV: Disable switching to other players vehicles
ui.options.multiplayer.fadeVehicles: Fade out vehicles as they get closer
ui.options.multiplayer.fadeVehicles.tool: Good when paired with disabled collisions
ui.options.multiplayer.disableLuaReload: Disable Lua reloading when quitting a multiplayer server.
Lua reloads are required to ensure that the game is put back to a working state if mods had replaced game functions. Can be disabled for a smoother experience at your own risk.
ui.options.multiplayer.disableInstabilit: This will make gameplay smoother but can cause sync issues after several instabilities
ui.options.multiplayer.simplifyRemoteVeh: This setting will replace remote vehicles with the BeamNG provided 'traffic' versions. Reduces accuracy of collisions and visuals, but improves performance
ui.options.multiplayer.enableBlobs.toolt: Unspawned vehicles will appear as colored spheres (blobs)
ui.options.multiplayer.showSpectators: Show spectators' nametag under vehicle nametags
ui.options.multiplayer.showSpectators.to: Players spectating others' vehicles will be listed under their nametags
ui.options.multiplayer.spectatorUnifiedC: Draw all spectator nametags as grey, independent of the user's role
ui.options.multiplayer.nametagFadeDistan: How far nametags will start fading in/stop fading out
Maximum number of characters you want to see in a nametag
ui.options.multiplayer.shortenNametags.t: Trim long player names and roles
ui.options.multiplayer.unicycleAutoSave: Automatically save your last used Unicycle
When you despawn your Unicycle, it is saved and reused next time you spawn it
ui.multiplayer.guestDescription1: Playing as a guest may have some server restrictions, for the full experience we recommend using a registered account.
ui.multiplayerlauncher.lost: The game is not connected to the launcher! Please start the game using the BeamMP Launcher.
ui.multiplayertos.title: Rules and terms of service
ui.multiplayertos.tos.description1: Full terms of services can be found
ui.multiplayertos.tos.description2: In order to play BeamMP you will have to read and accept the terms of service.
ui.multiplayertos.rules.description2: In order to play BeamMP you will have to accept all the game only rules.
ui.multiplayertos.info1: For more information, be sure to check our
ui.multiplayertos.info2: You can also find more information on our
